Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Brevinin-2TSa (natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; XXU; 1S=S, UCSS1a)

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Broad-spectrum growth inhibitory activity against a range of Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria, including  E. coli ATCC25922 (MIC 3 uM), E. cloacae HNTCC 5300 (MIC 6 uM), P. aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC 6 uM), K. pneumoniae KK3 9904 (MIC 6 uM), S. aureus NCTC 8325 or MRSA (MIC 12.5-25 uM), S. epidermidis RP62A (MIC 12.5 uM), E. faecalis ATCC 29212 (MIC 25 uM), C. albicans ATCC 90028 (MIC 100 uM).Toxicity: HC50 100 uM. Updated 5/2020; 4/2024.
Literature Information.Author: Conlon JM, et al., Iwamuro S.2006
Literature Information.Title: Antimicrobial peptides from the skin of the Tsushima brown frog Rana tsushimensis
